name: Alchemy Deck
description:
Your master was a very good alchemist, but it is time for you to become more than an apprentice. You have improved a lot and can create potions that even your master cannot make. There was a need for a young and creative alchemist in a nearby village. Can you sell your potions there and take the first step towards becoming the best alchemist of the middle ages? Now is the time! But it won't be easy. You'll be up against some very talented alchemists and you'll have to be better than them if you have your sights set on the top. Are you still here? Show them how good an alchemist you are!

Collect Materials

Plants, mushrooms, minerals and animal parts are the basic ingredients for creating potions. Take on apprentices and leave them to the resources to gather ingredients. Make no mistake, they will get you the best ingredients. Don't forget to give them their gold at the end of the day!

Brew Potion

If you have the ingredients, you can make potions. Don't keep the customers waiting, get to work right away. Don't forget to use your tool cards while making potions, we'd like to see you as a master alchemist, wouldn't we?

Sell Potions

Well, you can't do business on an empty stomach. Let's make some money. You can earn gold by selling your potions to customers. Don't forget us if you get rich, okay?

Improve Your Shop

Now that you've got the money, why don't you upgrade your potion shop? You can upgrade all your tool cards and increase their production speed. Of course, if you want to produce The Philosopher's Stone, that's up to you.

Attention Attention!

Not everything is so easy, of course there are challenges. Be careful not to be harmed by bandits or wild animals. You can train your apprentices and overcome enemy cards. You can do it, right? Nobody wants to lose their money and leave town.

Features:

  • +3000 Unique Potion
  • +200 Unique Card
  • Card Transformations
  • Combat System
